short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser's new tab into a tranquil Japanese garden scene.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The background features blossoming cherry trees in soft pink hues, a serene pond reflecting the gentle sunlight, and traditional Japanese pavilions, providing a peaceful atmosphere while you browse. Perfect for those who love nature and want to add a touch of elegance to their browsing experience.
